body: When will the next ban appeals be read? I really wanna know.
body_tagged: When will the next ban appeals be read? I really wanna know.
title: when will the next ban appeals be read

replies.body:
Sr Mods constantly check appeals, it might take a couple of days for them to read yours. If you haven't gotten a reply in about a week or two send another one over. 
I will lock this thread to prevent further spam ;D
